mapper.select: SELECT id, shop_admin_id, token, expires_at, used, created_at FROM qr_manage_password_reset_token WHERE shop_admin_id = #{shopAdminId} AND used = FALSE AND expires_at > NOW() ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qr_manage_password_reset_token (shop_admin_id, token, expires_at, used, created_at) VALUES (#{shopAdminId}, #{token}, #{expiresAt}, #{used}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE qr_manage_password_reset_token SET used = TRUE WHERE shop_admin_id = #{shopAdminId} AND used = FALSE
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM qr_manage_password_reset_token WHERE expires_at < NOW() OR used = TRUE
